title: Synthesis of star-shaped poly(lactide)s, poly(valerolactone)s and poly(caprolactone)s via ROP catalyzed by N-donor tin(II) cations and comparison of their wetting properties with linear analogues
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23273-23285
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03515A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Miroslav Novák, Yaraslava Milasheuskaya, Michael Srb, Štěpán Podzimek, Marek Bouška, Roman Jambor
This work deals with the comparison of the hydrophobic properties of linear and star-shaped biodegradable polyesters prepared using N-coordinated tin(II) cations operating via activated monomer mechanism.
